LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_InteractionChanc: How likely predator and prey will interact with each other, each vore-tick.
LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_MultiPreyModifie: Interation odds are lowered if the pred has multiple prey. At 100%, each prey lowers interaction odds by a factor of 1, keeping the total chance for an interaction to the base chance.\n\nNote that preds can potentaly interact with multiple prey at once.
LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_OpinionModifierT: How much the pred and prey's opinion of each other affect interaction odds. 100% doubles odds at 100 opinion, and halves at -100.
LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_BaseOpinionMod_T: How much to offset the predator and prey's opinion of each other, when determining what interactions to use. High opinion leads to more amicable interactions. Does not affect their base opinions of each other.
LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_KindOpinionMod_T: How much opinion to add if either the pred or prey have the Kind trait.
LanguageData.RV2Interaction_Settings_SkillOpinionMod_: How much opinion to add for the pred or prey's skills in Social or Animals. Maxes out to this value at level 20.
